alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 9:11PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1000 PM MST... At 911 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phoenix International Raceway, or near Avondale, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Avondale, Goodyear, Cashion, Phoenix International Raceway, Estrella Mountain Park, Estrella Mountain Ranch and Rainbow Valley. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 123 and 125. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
